fulltext:
PERSONAL INFORMATION NGO, VAN HAI 
427 Kha Van Can, Hiep Binh Chanh, Thu Duc   
  +84 933 946 715 
 ngovhai89@gmail.com  
Sex Male | Date of birth 29/09/1989 | Nationality Vietnamese 
OVERVIEW & PERSONAL 
STATEMENT 
A strategic and creative thinker who tend to use logical thinking in problem solving and try 
new ways of working.  
A persistent and optimistic person who commit to the set-goal and try for a better result.  
A fast learner with high adaptability and an effective communication skill. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Apr 2018 – Now 
Freelancer – Personal Trainer 
➢ Roles and Responsibilities: being responsible for the delivery various personal 
training services that offer clients a safe method to maximize workout efficiency, improve 
fitness, and satisfy clients’ expectations. I am enthusiastic about Fitness and willing to go 
the extra kilometres to help my clients reach their goals. 
• 
Develop and implement personalized exercise and diet programs to assist individual 
clients 
• 
Counsel clients about fitness, exercise, and injury management 
• 
Instruct clients how to use equipment and ensure all equipment is well maintained  
2016 – 2018 
Personal Trainer – Team Leader 
Company: CMG.ASIA Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam  
Department: Fitness 
➢ Roles and Responsibilities 
• 
Develop and implement personalized exercise and diet programs to assist individual 
clients 
• 
Counsel clients about fitness, exercise, and injury management 
• 
Instruct clients how to use equipment and ensure all equipment is well maintained 
• 
Supervised gym members, and providing them information on correct techniques 
for preventing injuries as well as improving fitness levels 
• 
Designed diet plans and exercise regimes for individuals suffering from obesity, 
certain disabilities, health issues or specific ailments 
• 
Demonstrated the correct way to use exercise equipment available within the gym's 
premises and monitoring their misuse by the members 
• 
Provided assistance to the new members of the gym by explaining them about 
appropriate use of the equipment and giving detailed instructions to avoid 
dangerous mishaps 
• 
Prepared teaching area before class and returned equipment to storeroom after 
lessons 
• 
Served customers and advised them about memberships, club facilities, and class 
timetables 
• 
Maintained client membership database 
Page 1 / 2  
2014 – 2016 
Vice Production Manager  
Company:  Robert Bosch Vietnam Co., Ltd 
Department: Production 
➢ Roles and Responsibilities: Supporting Production Manager on daily operations  
• 
Follow and enforce all established policies, procedures, and recognized practices 
• 
Oversee production schedule; assign and oversee all projects 
• 
Estimate costs and follow budgets accordingly 
• 
Resolve any issues; handle maintenance work when necessary 
• 
Meet and exceed all customer service requirements 
• 
Assist in taking physical inventories in accordance with corporate procedures 
• 
Coordinate with the maintenance manager on the preventative and emergency 
maintenance required for operational equipment 
EDUCATION  
  2011 – 2014  
Industrial University of HoChiMinh City 
  2008  
Highschool Graduation 
EXTRA CURRICULAR 
ACTIVITIES 
MARTIAL ART CERTIFICATE  
ACHIEVEMENTS 
➢ Rated as “High Performance” on Employee Performance Review in club Vivo City of 
California Fitness and Yoga as “willing to do beyond the roles & responsibilities and being 
considered as an essential factor for the success of the whole team” 
➢ Rated as “High Performance” on Employee Performance Review in Bosch Vietnam 
SKILLS  
Language(s) 
ENGLISH:  Daily conversation – to be improved 
- 
April – June 2019: Joined Intensive English course  
• 
Time management 
• 
Analytics and Research 
• 
Critical thinking 
• 
Effective communication 
• 
Intercultural awareness 
• 
Adaptability 
 Interpersonal skills 
• 
High-sense of responsibility 
• 
Can-do attitude 
• 
Team-work 
• 
Detailed-oriented 
• 
Hard-working 
• 
Working under pressure 
AREA OF INTERESTS 
SPORT  TRAVEL
